article.title: BAE to Provide Deep Water Mine Hunting Technology
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.abstract: BAE Systems Information and Electronics, Nashua, N.H., is being awarded an $11,005,126 modification under a previously awarded contract (N00024-10-C-6302) to fabricate, assemble, test and deliver three AN/SQQ-32(V)4 Minehunting Sonar Set High Frequency Wideband upgrade systems.
article.text: BAE Systems Information and Electronics, Nashua, N.H., is being awarded an $11,005,126 modification under a previously awarded contract (N00024-10-C-6302) to fabricate, assemble, test and deliver three AN/SQQ-32(V)4 Minehunting Sonar Set High Frequency Wideband upgrade systems. The AN/SQQ-32 Minehunting Sonar was designed for deep water minehunting. The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity.Â
